remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底實作呈現``具有給定屬性的標記。The base implementation renders a `` tag with the given attributes. 繼承的介面卡，可以覆寫這個方法，並修改屬性的字典，然後再呼叫基底實作。Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes before calling the base implementation. 這個 API 已經過時。This API is obsolete. 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱行動應用程式&ASP.NET 網站。For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: if any extra head elements were written; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法被呼叫兩次。This method is called twice. 在第一次呼叫時，寫入器參數是`null`，而且方法會傳回`true`或`false`，表示是否有其他``来寫入的項目。On the first call, the writer parameter is `null`, and the method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether or not it has additional `` elements to write. 在第二個呼叫時，此方法會使用提供的寫入器寫入內容。On the second call, the method writes the content by using the provided writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會寫入輸出資料流中的連結。This method writes a link to the output stream. 若要讓使用者將表單的頁之間瀏覽在分頁表單上顯示的連結。The link appears on paginated forms to enable to the user to navigate between a form's pages.
